name: Hymn (LabG, Pulg maz, helscarthe, jamesmegaman)
description:
I. Description

Long ago, a global catastrophic event took music away from the world. The joy of sound and dance - lost in time, forgotten by the masses. Today, you, the ever inquisitive explorer, stumbled upon an ancient temple, forsaken and left to ruin in the midst of a vast jungle. The glyphs on the wall beckon to you, as if a physical sensation from an age long gone found its way back to you.

"This glyph... a... quarter note? How... how do I know that?"

Journey into the Ancient Temple of Music, and uncover the mysteries behind the catastrophe that took away mankind's greatest joy. Can you bring back music to the world?

II. How to play

TBA
